es.situm.sdk.v1

Class SitumPositioningManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.situm.sdk.v1.SitumPositioningManager
  • Deprecated. 
    use SitumIPSManager instead.

    @Deprecated
public class SitumPositioningManager
extends Object
    Manage Situm's Indoor Positioning Service

    • Constructor Summary

      SitumPositioningManager()
      Deprecated. 
      Should call initialize to start the positioning service

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public boolean initialize(android.content.Context c_,
                          SitumBuilding b,
                          boolean usewifi,
                          boolean useble,
                          boolean usemag)
        Deprecated. 
        Starts the positioning service for the given building using the desired information sources: wifi, ble and magnetic field information
        Parameters:
        c_ - App to bind the service to
        b - Building to start positioning into
        usewifi - Use wifi to estimtate postion
        useble - Use ibeacons to estimate postion
        usemag - Use magnetic field to estimate postiong
        Returns:
        true if service started correctly, false otherwise

      • initialize

        Deprecated. 
        Call this method when closing an application to stop SitumService otherwise the service will be left up and running (consuming battery from the device)
